Oc_lettings_site

Views

oc_lettings_site.views.handler404(request, exception=None)[source]

Custom handler for the 404 error (Page Not Found). Renders the ‘404.html’ template. Args:

request: The incoming HTTP request. exception (Optional): Exception that triggered the 404 error.

Returns:

HttpResponse object with the rendered template and status set to 404.

oc_lettings_site.views.handler500(request)[source]

Custom handler for the 500 error (Internal Server Error). Renders the ‘500.html’ template. Args:

request: The incoming HTTP request.

Returns:

HttpResponse object with the rendered template and status set to 500.

oc_lettings_site.views.index(request)[source]

View for the homepage. Renders the ‘index.html’ template.

Args:

request: The incoming HTTP request.

Returns:

HttpResponse object with the rendered template.

oc_lettings_site.views.trigger_500_error(request)[source]

This view raises an exception to trigger a 500 error for test cases.

Tests

class oc_lettings_site.tests.BaseViewsTestCases(methodName='runTest')[source]

Test cases for index and errors-handlers views. Every test assert the correct status code and the template used.
